name: Ping (The Game)
description:
Ping , classic digital table tennis, Remade!

Either battle it out with a friend in Co-Op or challenge the computer to a match!

Controls:

Player 1 (Left) - Up/Down 

Player 2 (Right) - W/A

Additional Notes:

Thanks to Jan for help with the bot logic and playtesting. 

No Web build because nothing works.

Also please report bugs in the comments :D
